messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] thanks Sandra
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/11/03 6:30:22 AM, ynxn96@frontiernet.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/11/03 6:30:22 AM, ynxn96@... writes:

<< Your

response was what I'd been thinking and I appreciate knowing I'm on the

right track. >>

Well...
If your husband would hate my ideas, that might be the WRONG track! <g>

But you're welcome to whatever ends up helping, and *sorry* for anything that
ends up making anything worse. <g>

Sandra

messages.subject: thanks Sandra
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I just wanted to take a second to say thanks for your reply to my question about my dh s need to press my girls to do stuff.  Your response was what
messages.messageBody:
Sandra, I just wanted to take a second to say thanks for your reply to
my question about my dh's need to press my girls to do stuff. Your
response was what I'd been thinking and I appreciate knowing I'm on the
right track. I'm doubt I could ever get him to read any books on
homeschooling or unschooling, but I might be able to persuade him to
read an article or to...probably yours :). So thanks for taking the
time to reply. I appreciate you. HeidiC.
